mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id_lower AS lowerId, member_id_higher AS higherId FROM rooms WHERE member_id_lower = LEAST(#{senderId}, #{receiverId}) AND member_id_higher = GREATEST(#{senderId}, #{receiverId})

SELECT r.id, r.member_id_lower AS lowerId, r.member_id_higher AS higherId, m1.username AS lowerIdUsername, m2.username AS higherIdUsername FROM rooms r LEFT JOIN members m1 ON r.member_id_lower = m1.id LEFT JOIN members m2 ON r.member_id_higher = m2.id WHERE member_id_lower = #{memberId} OR member_id_higher = #{memberId}
